snippet.title: Behind the Scenes of Pentiment - Xbox Games Showcase Extended 2022
snippet.description:
Go behind the scenes of Pentiment with Obsidian Entertainment. Led by game director Josh Sawyer, this game is brought to life by a talented team inspired by illuminated manuscripts, woodcut prints, and history itself.

Play it Day One with Xbox Game Pass

https://www.xbox.com/games/pentiment
